post: To me, Christianity interprets Christ’s actions represented on the Shroud as acts to redeem humanity from slavery to sin. Sin can be described as the disordered loves in our life – when our love is disordered, it is out of sync with the design for our life. The love is in the willful suffering, death and resurrection of Jesus – He was not murdered the way He was without choice, His choice to do this to redeem us. I hope that helps you to answer your question. If you would like to discuss further, click my name and click on the Webmaster e mail link..
